title: School Grand Opening
body: Get ready! We plan to open registration in early October. We'll announce the exact date very soon, so keep an eye on our updates.

title: Exam Schedule Change
body: The final exams for all grades have been moved up by one week. Please check the updated schedule on the school portal.

title: Annual Sports Day
body: Join us for our Annual Sports Day on October 25th. All students are requested to wear their house uniforms.

title: Parent-Teacher Meeting
body: A Parent-Teacher meeting is scheduled for this Saturday at 9 AM. Your presence is highly appreciated to discuss your child's progress.

title: School Closed Due to Weather
body: School will remain closed tomorrow due to heavy rainfall as a precautionary measure. Classes will resume the following day.
